inclusion.criterion: Patient ≥ 70 years old and NYHA class ≥2 and LVEF <60% or global LV strain more than -17%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other severe disease with a life prognosis below than 1 year
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Already known other causes of amyloidosis than senile amyloidosis will be excluded
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has significant aortic stenosis and meets criteria for surgical aortic valve replacement. No exclusion criteria mentioned.
